title: PinCS Overview
description: This lesson provides an overview of what PinCS is and how you can work with PinCS Interactive Lessons.

props.text: ==PinCS== stands for **Pedagogy in Computer Science**, which is a lab at Stanford aiming to improve education.
This is the ==interactive lessons== platform, where you can **use** and **create** highly-engaging lessons across various high school subjects.
**Our objective** is to *support you in designing lessons that captivate students while opening pathways to computer science concepts for those who might not otherwise have access.*
Move onto the next slide to learn about this platform.
This is an example of a lesson. There are many other lessons just like this, but for high school subjects.

props.title: PinCS Interactive Lessons Structure
props.svg: <svg width="640" height="480" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:se="http://svg-edit.googlecode.com"><g class="layer"><title>Layer 1</title><path fill="none" id="conn_svg_7" se:connector="svg_1 svg_5" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="5" d="M320 122.5V295"/><path fill="#ff80cc" id="svg_1" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="5" d="M220 20h200v100H220z"/><text fill="#000000" font-family="Times" font-size="40" id="svg_2" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0" text-anchor="middle" x="320" xml:space="preserve" y="70">PinCS</text><text fill="#000000" font-family="Times" font-size="22.32" id="svg_3" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0" text-anchor="middle" x="320" xml:space="preserve" y="102.4">Interactive Lessons</text><ellipse cx="320" cy="309" fill="#ff80cc" id="svg_4" rx="100" ry="40" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="5"/><text fill="#000000" font-family="Times" font-size="22.32" id="svg_5" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0" text-anchor="middle" x="320" xml:space="preserve" y="315">Pre-made Lessons</text></g></svg>

props.text: We aim for each of our lessons to be:

items.text: **high quality** (with well-made content and accessible material),
**easy to teach** (with teacher resources and a ready-to-go lesson),
and **engaging** (with interactive components and hands-on coding).

props.text: Our pre-made lessons try to enrich any course by diving deep into to the subject using a computer science concept that may had been hidden.

props.text: You can also make your own lessons using our **Lesson Maker**. This makes the lessons as customizable as you'd like.

props.text: We have high-quality lessons you can use and you can make your own lessons.

We hope you have a great time using our lessons and making your own.
